Module com.gang60
Package com.gang60

Class MenuItemModel

java.lang.Object
com.gang60.MenuItemModel
public class MenuItemModel extends Object
Represents a menu item in the POS system.

    • MenuItemModel

      public MenuItemModel(Integer id, String nameFull, BigDecimal basePrice, boolean premium, boolean custom)
      Constructs a new MenuItemModel with the given properties.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique menu item ID
      nameFull - the full name of the item
      basePrice - the base price as a BigDecimal
      premium - whether the item is a premium product
      custom - whether the item supports customization
